article.title: Northrop Grumman Receives SAVANT Intelligence Contract
article.author: George Seffers

tags.tag: National Air and Space Intelligence Center

article.text: Northrop Grumman Space and Mission Systems Corporation, Herndon, Virginia, is being awarded an $11,799,904 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract to provide for the implementation, maintenance, enhancement, and operational support at the National Air and Space Intelligence Center for the Systematic Architecture for Virtual Analytic Net-Centric Threat Intelligence (SAVANT), space support and SAVANT controlled interface.Â Air Force Research Laboratory, Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio, is the contracting activity.
